product.title: Japanese Lucky Cat Building Blocks
product.body_html:
• Description
  • FAQ
  • Shipping

  • Wave in Fortune and Luck to 2021 with your own Japanese Lucky Cat 招き猫 

    For everyone, it has been a very tough year, so what better way to start a New Year with an Iconic Japanese Lucky Cat. Some called it the Fortune cat, Money cat, Waving cat, Beckoning cat, and others called the Maneki Neko. All means good luck or fortune. 

    🌸 Measurements: about 5x6x8in / 14x16x20cm
    🌸 Compatible with leading blocks of standard size (16mm)
    🌸 Each set has over 720 pieces
    🌸 Includes motor
    📦 Excludes original box to protect the environment. For further details please see below.*

    We have two different Japanese Lucky Fortune Cat for you to build and enjoy when it is completed. It has 722 pieces of building block for you to enjoy building.

    There are 3 different styles of a lucky cat, either left paw up, right paw up or both paws up. If its left paw is up then it means to attract customers in. Right paw up means to attract luck and fortune. I guess you know what it means when both paws are up, it means attracts customers and money. You will see some will buy it for business and some for home. 

     

    The first Lucky Cat building set is Maneki Neko holding a gavel / Mallet / small hammer on the right-hand arm. This is a special magic money mallet and when it is shaken, it will bring in fortune and money.


    You can turn to wave the hand or motorize it with its own new free latest motor included in the packet.

    It has removable stickers. From the top right-hand side image says good fortune, top left-hand side image says attract luck. the bottom left-hand side image says welcome luck, and the bottom right-hand side image says long life.

    The second Lucky Cat building set is Maneki Neko holding a couplet / stickers / plaque on both arms. In ancient times, Scholars or graduates would love to write a pair of poems vertically on red ( red means luck ) paper. 

    You can turn to wave the hand or motorize it with its own new free latest motor included in the packet.

    The couplet can be swap easily with different meanings. The top image is saying to attract fortune and one million dollars. The bottom left image is saying all directions of fortune and attract fortune. The bottom right image is saying Open all doors of fortune + Gold opportunities.

    Measurements for both lucky cats are shown below

    With exquisite details, as shown above, there are lots of cool features and moving parts to entertain you for a long time, and role play. 

    Our building blocks are designed with advanced engineering features and challenging tasks for all fans of challenging built, and still achievable to complete by following the instruction booklet.

    The perfect gift for those who love their crafts!

    You will love seeing your family and friends in excitement when they receive our building blocks, leaving an everlasting smile on your loved ones by surprising them with these super innovative and cool building blocks today.

    * Our Building Block sets are packaged in safe and secured protective bags. They do NOT come in the original box to reduce the carbon footprint, save the planet, and reduce postage cost on your behalf. It will come with all the pieces and a detailed instruction booklet for you to follow along. 

    Features

    😻 100% premium quality (ABS) plastic
    😻 Sharp brilliant colors and solid feel
    😻 Challenging and rewarding to stimulate all brains
    😻 High-quality durable non-toxic green material

    WARNING: CHOKING HAZARD - Contain small parts; not suitable for children under 8 years old unless there is adult supervision.


  • Do you ship worldwide? Yes, we ship to over 300 countries and proud to provide free shipping to the United States, the United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, and many countries in Europe.

    What are the blocks made from?     All our building blocks are manufactured from a High-Quality Premium strong, resilient plastic known as acrylonitrile butadiene styrene (ABS) and will stand the test of time and provide hours of fun building their own creations

    Does this help with stress and development?     Our building blocks is a great way to relieve stress and engage in meaningful and joyful conversations. As children comment on their building creations, they develop important communication skills including the ability to explain ideas, describe their work, talk about the process and verbalize challenges that they had along the way. 

    CHOKING HAZARD: Small parts. Not for children under 6 years old

     

  • We are proud to offer FREE tracked shipping to 200+ countries worldwide including the United States, Canada, United Kingdom, Australia, New Zealand, Germany, France, Italy, Austria, Netherlands, and many other. If you are wondering if we ship to your country please head over to our Shipping Policy.

    Due to the pandemic delivery times may vary between 5 to 30 business days with possibilities of delays. Please be patient with the postal services as they try their best to deliver your plushies to you in a timely manner. Find out more about the delays here.
